alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 9:43AM PST until January 04 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches expected today into tonight. Snow may be heavy at times on Tuesday, with another 8 to 12 inches possible. Winds may gust 35 to 45 mph at times. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until noon PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
